definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
to hunt for novelty/to seek novelty
to skim (through a book)/to read cursorily/to dip into

sentences.english: In the story, the cunning fox outsmarts the hunters.
sentences.chinese: 在這個故事中，狡猾的狐狸智取了獵人們。

sentences.english: Let us go fox-hunting with Beth.
sentences.chinese: 我們和貝思一起去獵狐狸吧。

sentences.english: The park had fine trees, and there were deer roaming among them.
sentences.chinese: 獵苑裏樹木優良，鹿漫遊於樹間。

sentences.english: P1ease don't tell me the story. I want to see it myself.
sentences.chinese: 請不要告訴我故事獵箝害我想自看看。

sentences.english: Finally those who hunt them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最後，對湧鋃獵珍稀野生動物的人必須嚴懲。

sentences.english: An arch of the bridge in the park has been sapped and sopped away.
sentences.chinese: 獵園裏的那座橋有一個橋洞被水沖毀，而且被沖走了。

sentences.english: The Norwegian Elkhound is a square and athletic member of the northern dog family.
sentences.chinese: 挪威獵麋鹿犬是一種正方形比例，運動型的北方狗。

sentences.english: Soon after the hunters came to the stable, and asked if anyone had seen the hart.
sentences.chinese: 獵人們很快來到牛欄，詢問是否有人看到這頭鹿。

sentences.english: This was after a white bear with patches of brown fur was shot by hunters.
sentences.chinese: 當時獵人們射殺了一隻長着棕色斑塊皮毛白熊。

sentences.english: The hunters took a fox by a trap.
sentences.chinese: 獵人們設陷阱捉住一隻狐狸。

sentences.english: The hedge shook as he tangled with the hound.
sentences.chinese: 它和獵浣熊犬撕扯時，樹籬晃個不停。

sentences.english: If the hunters were there, Huineng cried and begged them to release the animals.
sentences.chinese: 如果獵人們在場，慧能就哭着求他們把動物放走。

sentences.english: I have never gone hunting in my life!
sentences.chinese: 我一生中從來沒有去狩過獵。

sentences.english: Remember that grief is a natural pridator, so learn to tolerate some damage.
sentences.chinese: 謹記，悲傷是天然的獵多者，因此要學會忍受損失。

sentences.english: I went hunting and killed me a a couple deer today, what did you do?
sentences.chinese: 我今天去打獵獵，獵到了兩頭小鹿，你幹什麼了？

definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
